modules.description: This module implements file storage operations using MariaDB, providing functions to upload, download, update, and delete files by their base64-encoded content. It works with file metadata and content through `Sihl__.Contract_storage.file` and `Sihl__.Contract_storage.stored` types, supporting optional and mandatory retrieval, base64 encoding, and lifecycle management. Concrete use cases include storing user-uploaded files, serving file metadata, and managing file content in a relational database.

This module handles file storage operations including uploading, downloading, updating, and deleting files using base64 encoded data. It works with `Sihl__.Contract_storage.file` and `Sihl__.Contract_storage.stored` types, supporting metadata retrieval and binary content manipulation. Concrete use cases include managing user-uploaded files, storing and retrieving configuration files, and handling file attachments in a database-backed system.

This module handles file storage operations using base64-encoded data, supporting upload, download, update, and deletion of files along with metadata manipulation. It works with `file` and `stored` types, which include fields like `id`, `filename`, `filesize`, and `mime`, allowing metadata updates and content encoding. Concrete use cases include managing user-uploaded files, handling file attachments, and storing configuration files in a database-backed system.
